forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunderstorms. High 9C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with thunderstorms by evening. High 48F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
